item.title: Beeper’s all-in-one messaging app relaunches with an on-device model and premium upgrades
item.description: Multi-service messaging app Beeper, which allows people to connect to all their chat apps from one interface, is relaunching its app on Wednesday to o...

item.title: India eyes global quantum computer push — and QpiAI is its chosen vehicle
item.description: QpiAI, an Indian startup that integrates AI and quantum computing for enterprise use cases, has raised $32 million in a new funding round co-led by th...

item.title: Scale AI lays off 14% of staff, largely in data-labeling business
item.description: Scale AI is cutting 14% of the company just weeks after Meta invested $14.3 billion in the startup and hired away its CEO.

item.title: Can US Measles Outbreaks Be Stopped?
item.description: The US almost lost its measles elimination status once. Lessons from that episode suggest it will be more difficult to avoid doing so now.

item.title: Watch Our Livestream Replay: Inside the AI Copyright Battles
item.description: Curious about generative AI and copyright? On July 16, our writers answered your questions about this critical topic.
